backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing images with a list-based API, allowing adding images and querying sorted results by PNG flag.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide with steps for building, deploying, verifying, and configuring a custom domain for the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light and dark theme palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting the page title, canonical link, and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component configuring theme provider, data initializer, portfolio page, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Hero-style about section showing profile image, LinkedIn overlay, name, summary, and navigation button.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact form with validation, toast feedback, social link handling, and submission via React Query.
No-op component since data initialization is now static.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with scroll detection, mobile menu, and smooth section navigation.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioLinksSe: Renders a grid of external portfolio links as cards with titles and visit buttons. Returns null if no links are provided.
Displays a featured projects grid with screenshots, descriptions, and role details. Handles missing screenshots and includes hover effects.
frontend/src/components/SkillsSection.ts: Shows categorized soft and hard skills in two styled cards. Uses static skill lists and decorative icons.
frontend/src/components/WorkExperienceSe: Displays a vertical timeline of work experiences with alternating layout. Each entry includes period, title, company, and description.
frontend/src/data/portfolioData.ts: Provides static portfolio data including about info, experiences, and projects. Used as the source content for portfolio queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes. Returns the current actor and fetch status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient. Exposes identity state, status flags, and provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks returning static portfolio data and a simulated contact form submission. Uses small delays for smoother UX.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables with base styles and a custom utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx: Renders the portfolio page with section-based scrolling state and handles loading and error states for fetched portfolio data.
frontend/src/types/portfolio.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for all portfolio-related data structures used in the frontend.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, radius, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s deployment state, issues, and feature requests related to ICP hosting.
